name: Possession (itch) (retrochambergames)
description:
Possess enemies.

Take control of (some) of their abilities.

Make it to the next platform.

Pick up the golden controller.

Level complete

Controls:

Move: WASD / arrows

Jump: Space

Possess: E

Un possess: Q

UI Button: Click with mouse

Edit:
Music and sounds implemented.
Character can no longer die by trap when possessing enemies.

This game was made for gamedevtv-game-jam-2021

This is my first time joining a game jam. Any feedback would be great.

Created by Johannes @ Retrochamber Games

Pixel-art by o_lobster
